title: California Dreamin' Turkey Burger
ingredients: 1 (16-ounce) package JENNIE-O Lean Turkey Burger Patties
4 slices JENNIE-O Turkey Bacon, cooked according to package directions
preparation: Cook turkey burgers according to package directions. Always cook until well done, 165 degrees F as measured by meat thermometer. Place cheese on turkey burger during the last 5 minutes of heating to melt cheese.
On bottom half of bun, spread guacamole. Place turkey burger with melted cheese on guacamole and top with turkey bacon. Add bun top.
note: Always cook to an internal temperature of 165 degrees F.
